sentences: Sandra Tola Harvey (née Casañas, January 19, 1962 – December 15, 2008), professionally known as Sandée, was an American freestyle music vocalist and an original member of the trio Exposé from 1984 to 1986, along with Alejandra "Alé" Lorenzo and Laurie Miller.
On December 15, 2008, Sandée was found dead in her Hollywood, Florida, home.
Services were held for Sandra on Saturday, December 20, 2008, at Fred Hunter's funeral home.
